title: Ellie Goulding wows fans as she poses in new set of lingerie snaps
text:
Ellie looked amazing (Picture: Instagram)

Ellie Goulding has clearly impressed her fans after she shared a series of lingerie snaps.

The Anything Could Happen singer has been enjoying the married life since tying the knot to husband Caspar Jopling in August, and decided to take some down-time by sharing a set of selfies to her Instagram followers.

Taking to the social media app on 4 October, Ellie posted a series of photos as she donned a lacy black bra, which she paired with blue eyeliner and gold jewellery.

‘Me plus [champagne] equals [selfies],’ she captioned the post, as she posted a series of emojis to highlight what she was saying.

And among the flutter of heart eyed emojis left in the comments, many fans were quick to praise the singer’s beauty.

‘Girl you’re looking good,’ one fan said.

‘What a lovely set of pictures. Thank you for sharing them,’ another stated.

‘You are so beautiful,’ another added.

The singer donned a lacy black bra (Picture: Instagram)

She paired the bra with blue eyeliner and gold jewellery (Picture: Instagram)

‘Why are you so perfect?’ one fan questioned.

It comes after Ellie married long-term partner Caspar Jopling back in August, in a ceremony held at the York Minister Cathedral.

Stars such as Katy Perry, Orlando Bloom and Sienna Miller were all in attendance, as many fans also turned up outside the cathedral to see the happy couple say ‘I do’.

Ellie impressed her fans with the series of photos (Picture: Instagram)

Ellie has been enjoying the married life, after marrying Caspar Jopling back in August (Picture: Instagram)

Ellie and Caspar have been together since 2017 (Picture: Instagram)

Following the wedding, the couple and guests enjoyed a lavish reception at the Castle Howard. The two reportedly used the same events company that Prince William and Kate Middleton and Prince Harry and Meghan Markle used to arrange their wedding reception.

During the wedding, Ellie donned an intricate bespoke Chloé gown with the couple’s initials embroidered on the veil, which reportedly took 640 hours to make.

Ellie and Caspar have been together since 2017, with the two announcing their engagement in The Times in August 2018.
